item.title: What a Deadly Offensive in Syria Means for a Stalled Civil War
item.description: Rebel groups have launched the largest offensive in years against government forces in the northwest.

item.title: Lake-Effect Storm Bringing Heavy Snow to Great Lakes Region
item.description: Forecasters warned that some areas would be “paralyzed” by the snow as some sections of highways in New York and Pennsylvania were closed on Friday.

item.title: Taiwan’s President Visits Pacific Islands to Counter China’s Influence
item.description: Lai Ching-te is looking to shore up support from three island nations that are among a dwindling number to keep diplomatic ties with Taiwan.

item.title: Syria Rebels Reach Aleppo, in Biggest Advance in Years
item.description: A new assault on Syrian regime forces reached the major city, according to rebels and a war monitor. Government warplanes struck back at rebel territo...

item.title: Trudeau Goes to Mar-a-Lago to See Trump Amid Tariff Concerns
item.description: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau of Canada is the first foreign G7 leader to visit President-elect Donald J. Trump since the election. He is under pressu...
